org.unbunt.ella.compiler.antlr
Class LazyLexer

java.lang.Object
  org.antlr.runtime.BaseRecognizer
      org.antlr.runtime.Lexer
          org.unbunt.ella.compiler.antlr.LazyLexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.antlr.runtime.TokenSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
EllaLexer, EllaStringLexer
public abstract class LazyLexer
extends org.antlr.runtime.Lexer

Base class for lexers that whish to use the lazy lexing infrastructure.

This lexer, by default, associates every generated token with it's corresponding text so that it is available without having to read it from a stream that might already have the relevant text discarded.

Method Detail

nextToken

public org.antlr.runtime.Token nextToken()
Return a token from this source; i.e., match a token on the char stream.

Additionally the token's text is associated with the token.

Specified by:
nextToken in interface org.antlr.runtime.TokenSource
Overrides:
nextToken in class org.antlr.runtime.Lexer
